WorkPlace.Name: Colo ApS
WorkPlace.Description:
Colo ApS beskæftiger sig med Executive Search, Search & Selection samt beslægtede konsulentydelser inden for privat og offentlig virksomhed. Virksomheden har kunder over hele landet.
Få yderligere informationer om Colo ved at besøge hjemmesiden: www.colo.dk.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Hoyer, Hadsten

Do you want to be part of an international company with focus on both customers and employees? Do you have a strong technical back-ground and do you have comprehensive experience with electrical motors? Then Hoyer could be your new place of work!

Hoyer is an organization with activities in Europe, Asia and North America – in your everyday work life you will meet colleagues from all over the world. Hoyer is characterized by a strong drive and ambitions to always deliver the best service to our customers. At the same time Hoyer want to be a good place to work – every day – and employee satisfaction is high on the agenda. You are at eye level with your boss and you get to work in teams across both departments and national borders.

Hoyer is looking for a skilled Technical Engineer for our Technical team in Europe at our head office in Hadsten. You will become part of an international team which also includes a technical department in China.

Technical support to the organization in both Europe and Asia

As Technical Engineer, you are responsible for providing technical support and sharing knowledge internally in the organization and towards suppliers. You are also developing and maintaining electrical and mechanical documentation. You will work closely with the Global Technical Manager providing improvement suggestions and implementing special/larger projects. Your main assignments are:

  • Maintaining and presenting weekly task and workload status of the Technical Europe department to the Global Technical Manager.
  • Providing technical support to SCM, QC, test center and workshop/warehouse.
  • Providing technical support to motor suppliers.
  • Cross-department collaboration through projects, mainly with SCM and QC.
  • Responsible and point of contact for ATEX/IECEx.

You will become part of a dynamic team consisting of ten employees in Hadsten, Denmark and seven employees in Ningbo, China.

Strong technical profile and knowledge of electric motors

You have strong technical knowledge, insight and interest in the application and performance of electric motors, preferably with a bachelor or master degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering. Furthermore you are characterized by the following:

  • Structured and detail oriented.
  • Highly motivated and self-driven.
  • You take responsibility and respect deadlines.
  • Strong knowledge concerning the usage and function of SolidWorks and/or Auto-CAD.
  • Strong communicator – especially in technical English.
  • You thrive in a busy, changing environment.

Hoyer offer you:

  • An exciting position in an international organization.
  • International career development plan and coaching.
  • Cooperation with market leading suppliers and customers.
  • Modern company culture.
  • A strong corporate brand and identity in the market.

Looking forward to receiving your CV + other relevant documents (Word/pdf format).

Applications will be treated as confidential information.
